EmailTemplate.description: CS application left incomplete for 24 hour period
EmailTemplate.name: CS Customer - 24 Hour Application Notice
EmailTemplate.subject: Your BlueWave Community Solar application is incomplete!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
*|MC:SUBJECT|*
Dear {!Lead.FirstName}, Thank you for starting your BlueWave Community Solar application.
You're only a few steps away from subscribing to Community Solar in your local area. If you saved your credentials click here to move forward. If you did not save your information, click here to restart the process.
In the meantime, if you have any questions, you can reach us at customercare@bluewavesolar.com to access our Customer Care team. For an immediate response, please call 844-786-4100. - Sincerely, BlueWave Customer Care
